integrationPoints.paypal: All payment templates include PayPal SDK integration
integrationPoints.reactComponents: Compatible with React template loaders in client/src/components/samfox/

usage.loadTemplate: Use TemplateLoader.tsx to dynamically load any template
usage.paymentGateway: Use PaymentGateway.tsx wrapper for payment templates
usage.marketplace: Use MarketplaceFrame.tsx for marketplace template rendering
usage.dashboards: Use DashboardFrame.tsx for dashboard template rendering
